participant_1.background:
I love Mac and cheese so much that I even named my favorite book after it!
i was a mechanic for 6 years.
My pets are a great source of entertainment when I'm not rock climbing.
I love to make a big meal for my family on Thanksgiving.
i like being weird.

participant_2.background:
I like to cook for my family and friends because it allows me to relax and be creative.
i am not social.
My spouse is my manager and helps me with my career as a lead singer.
I am moving to a new city to pursue my dreams.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

content.text: Hi! I'm really passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me.
Hey! I'm glad you're passionate about something. I'm passionate about cooking for my family and friends because it allows me to relax and be creative.
That's awesome! I love cooking too, but I'm not very creative in the kitchen.
It doesn't take much creativity to be a good cook! Just follow a recipe and you'll be fine.
I know, but I'm always too lazy to read recipes. I just wing it and hope for the best.
Haha, I'm the same way! I usually just throw some stuff together and hope it turns out good.
I can relate! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes! There are so many different ways to make pasta, and it's always delicious.
Pasta is my favorite! I love it with red sauce and meatballs.
Yum! That sounds delicious. I love making pasta with pesto sauce and chicken.
That sounds good too! I love pesto sauce.
Me too! It's so flavorful and fresh.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to sing! I'm a lead singer in a band, and I also like to sing karaoke.
That's awesome! I love to sing too, but I'm not very good at it.
Don't worry, everyone loves to sing! It doesn't matter if you're good or not.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to rock climb! It's a great way to get exercise and have fun.
That sounds cool! I've never rock climbed before.
You should try it! It's really fun
